Title: Alt - Appraisal: FEMA (P) Impacted Areas
Description: Borrower attestation that the property has no storm damage and no claimes will be made to the insurance company. Realtor certification the home was visited post-storm along with photos confirming no damage. Photos must be dated and include both the interior and all angles of the exterior of the property, including the street scene. Seller certification that the property has no storm damage and no claims will be made to the insurance company.

Title: Appraisal: Appraisal Delivery
Description: Provide Evidence That Appraisal Was Delivered To Borrower; Must be given to the borrower within 3 days prior to closing or provide a fully executed 3 Day Waiver for Appraisal Receipt.
Enhanced Description by RAM: Condition rule: Provide Evidence That Appraisal Was Delivered To Borrower; Must be given to the borrower within 3 days prior to closing or provide a fully executed 3 Day Waiver for Appraisal Receipt. Title: CORR:  Secondary Appraisal
Description: The Appraisal Review Process requires a secondary appraisal product to support the appraisal value for the transaction. Acceptable review products include:  Clear Capital Desk Review (must contain a value and comparative sales data to support the valuation result), Field Review, Second Full Appraisal (appraisals must be completed by different, independent appraisers and the lower of the two appraised values used to determine value). The Appraisal Review product can be waived if the loan is submitted to Collateral Underwriter and receives a FNMA SSR score of 2.5 or lower.  Freddie SSRs cannot be used for this purpose.

Title: Misc:  HPML Fail - Rebuttable presumption
Description: Loan has alert for HPML, verify there is an escrow/impound account being set up (escrows cannot be waived), Appraisal must include interior review of property & be cleared. Appraisal disclosure must be given no later then 3rd day after we confirm loan is HPML. Appraisal delivery requirements must be met. 3 months reserves are required & Residual income of $2500 must be met _x000D_

Title: Property:  CONDO Full Review
Description: Review:  a) Completed Full Condo Questionnaire  b) Master Policy for liability (must include separation of insureds)  c) Master Policy for building coverage (number of units matching the appraisal and questionnaire)   d) Fidelity Coverage (if greater than 21 units)   e)  Flood Coverage if in flood zone   f) Building Law or Ordinance coverage  g) Mechanical Breakdown coverage   h) Current Budget showing reserve contribution of required 10%         i) By-laws, recorded legal documents for association    j)  2nd level review by UW MGR for warrantability
Enhanced Description by RAM: Condition rule: Review:  a) Completed Full Condo Questionnaire  b) Master Policy for liability (must include separation of insureds)  c) Master Policy for building coverage (number of units matching the appraisal and questionnaire)   d) Fidelity Coverage (if greater than 21 units)   e)  Flood Coverage if in flood zone   f) Building Law or Ordinance coverage  g) Mechanical Breakdown coverage   h) Current Budget showing reserve contribution of required 10%         i) By-laws, recorded legal documents for association    j)  2nd level review by UW MGR for warrantability Satisfaction logic: Condition is satisfied if **ANY ONE** of the following documents (with its specified attributes) is present and valid. Evaluate the following related document options: Condo PUD Questionnaire; Property Insurance; Flood Insurance; HOA Docs; Other Property Documentation; Hazard Insurance. For 'Condo PUD Questionnaire': extract Key Fields Relevant to Document and validate relevance and timeliness. For 'Property Insurance': extract Policy Type, Coverage Amount, Effective Date, Expiration Date and validate relevance and timeliness. For 'Flood Insurance': extract Policy Type, Coverage Amount, Effective Date, Expiration Date and validate relevance and timeliness. For 'HOA Docs': extract Key Fields Relevant to Document and validate relevance and timeliness. For 'Other Property Documentation': extract Key Fields Relevant to Document and validate relevance and timeliness. For 'Hazard Insurance': extract Policy Type, Coverage Amount, Effective Date, Expiration Date and validate relevance and timeliness. Use system functions where applicable: get_latest_document(doc_type), verify_document_expiration(doc_type), compare_document_data(doc1, doc2). Return the first qualifying evidence found, if any; otherwise return not satisfied. Output JSON: {meets_condition: true/false, satisfied_by: [doc_type], evidence: [{doc, fields:{...}, pages:[]}]}.

Title: Property:  Condo Master Policy
Description: Required coverage to include: $1m in liability; 100% replacement cost for hazard/common elements with coverage for all required perils (actual cash value not permitted); Crime/Fidelity (when >20 units & must cover 3mos of assessment of all units); Inflation Guard (unless GRC or Extended Coverage) and Building Ordinance or Law Coverage (unless evidence provided not obtainable in the market), and Flood when required. Policy to have a max 5% deductible and list the HOA as named insured.
